docs.title: Date
docs.text:
Description:

Metadata schema block containing the start and end date of the RAiD.

Requirement: mandatory

Cardinality: 1

Examples 

"date": {
    "startDate": "2009",
    "endDate": "2023-08-28"
}

docs.title: Id.id
docs.text:
Description:

The identifier of the raid, e.g. https://raid.org.au/102.100.100/zzz

Requirement: mandatory

Cardinality: 1

docs.title: Id.raidAgencyUrl
docs.text:
Description:

The URL for the raid via the minting raid agency system

Requirement: optional

Cardinality:

docs.title: Id.license
docs.text:
Description:

The license under which the RAiD Metadata Record associated with this Identifier has been issued.

Requirement: optional

Cardinality: 0..1

docs.title: Id.version
docs.text:
Description:

The version of the resource. Read-only. Increments automatically on update.

Requirement: optional

Cardinality: 0..1

Requirement: mandatory

Cardinality: 1

docs.title: RaidDto.Id.raidAgencyUrl
docs.text:
Description:

The URL for the raid via the minting raid agency system

Requirement: optional

Cardinality:

docs.title: RaidDto.Id.license
docs.text:
Description:

The license under which the RAiD Metadata Record associated with this Identifier has been issued.

Requirement: optional

Cardinality: 0..1

docs.title: RaidDto.Id.version
docs.text:
Description:

The version of the resource. Read-only. Increments automatically on update.

Requirement: optional

Cardinality: 0..1

docs.title: .license
docs.text:
Description:

The license under which the RAiD Metadata Record associated with this Identifier has been issued.

Requirement: optional

Cardinality: 0..1

docs.title: .raidAgencyUrl
docs.text:
Description:

The URL for the raid via the minting raid agency system

Requirement: optional

Cardinality:

docs.title: .version
docs.text:
Description:

The version of the resource. Read-only. Increments automatically on update.

Requirement: optional

Cardinality: 0..1

docs.title: Type: Boolean
docs.text:
A binary (true or false) value

URI: xsd:boolean

  • base: Bool

  • uri: xsd:boolean

  • repr: bool

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self xsd:boolean native https://raid.org/datamodel/api/raid/core/:boolean exact schema:Boolean

docs.title: Type: Curie
docs.text:
a compact URI

URI: xsd:string

  • base: Curie

  • uri: xsd:string

  • repr: str

docs.title: Comments
docs.text:
• in RDF serializations this MUST be expanded to a URI
  • in non-RDF serializations MAY be serialized as the compact representation

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self xsd:string native https://raid.org/datamodel/api/raid/core/:curie

docs.title: Type: Jsonpath
docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.

  • uri: xsd:string
